All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Board
Creates Letters to be used for WordHunt's grid Check's for validity of grid
Letter
Letter and position of each button of the board
Player
Keeps track of each Player's points and idenitifies them by name.
StartPage
Opening page of the game.
Word
Checks the word to confirm it's presence in the english dictionary and get the accurate amount of points the player who found it deserves.
WordHunt
Gameboard used to guess words Gameboard made with buttons of letters Point value and accuracy of word displayed
WordList
Final page of game Displays list of words guessed by user.
